We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AverageTrueRange _atr;
// In Initialize()
_atr = ATR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_atr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR True Range", _atr.TrueRange);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Is Ready", _atr.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Warm Up Period", _atr.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Current", _atr.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Name", _atr.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Samples", _atr.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.atr = self.ATR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.atr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR True Range", self.atr.TrueRange);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Is Ready", self.atr.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Warm Up Period", self.atr.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Current", self.atr.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Name", self.atr.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Samples", self.atr.Samples);
}
